<center>
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
wk_post %>%
  mutate(Icon_e = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon_e`, "ecampus") ~ '<img src="/logos/wvu-gold-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Icon_s = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon_s`, "slack") ~ '<img src="/logos/slack-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Icon_q = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon_q`, "qualtrics") ~ '<img src="/logos/qualtrics-ico.png" alt="Qualtrics icon" width="27">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Icon_m = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon_m`, "email") ~ '<img src="/logos/email-ico.png" alt="Email icon" width="27">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Site_e = na_if(Site_e, "")) %>%
  mutate(Site_s = na_if(Site_s, "")) %>%
  mutate(Site_q = na_if(Site_q, "")) %>%
  mutate(Link_e = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon_e) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site_e," target='_blank'>",Icon_e,"</a>"),
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Link_s = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon_s) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site_s," target='_blank'>",Icon_s,"</a>"),
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Link_q = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon_q) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site_q," target='_blank'>",Icon_q,"</a>"),
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  select(-Icon_e, -Icon_s,  -Icon_q, -Site_e, -Site_s, -Site_q) %>% 
  select(Description, Details, Link_e, Link_s, Link_q, Icon_m) %>%
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Description", "Details", "eCampus", "Slack", "Qualtrics", "Email"),
      "html",
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lcc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "25em", color = "#ffffff", extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  column_spec(2:3, width = "5em", color = "#ffffff", extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(0:3, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent")
```
</center>
